name: Hot-Pink
description:
Hot-Pink is a 2D adventure classic game.
Explore the underground world by finding the keys that is hidden and collect the souls.

-Hot-Pink has beautiful art that is made by hand.
-The mechanic of the game has a fluid and responsive action;
-The game itself for players who seeks challenge and puzzle.
-The Hot-Pink is a character that has a weapon to shoot enemies and blocks.
- Abilities to dash/fly/jump three times/hold the wall to jump from the wall
-The game has inventory system


This game is made by only one person by designing and building game even an illustration.
Step into the game and experience Hot-Pink for yourself!
